attributes.action: Make more money and support available to people with mental health disabilities
attributes.additional_details: So you see someone with bi-polar having a breakdown. we should be able to dial 999 say mental health help please. Then a specialist should come out to talk to the disabled person and determine what they can do to help. If needed this poor individual should be taken to a hospital designed to help people with mental health issues. The NHS try to help such people but they can only do there best. Please help these people just because you cant see this disability doesn't mean it isn't there.
attributes.background: The uk government should create and trail run mental health hospitals and an emergency service for people with mental health issues. From the moment someone dials 999 they should only be talking to trained professionals who have specialist skills in helping mentally disabled people.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/167562
